typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DataLoading
DataLoading derive(col_fix = iif(length(col) == 14, col, '')) ~> TimestampParsing
TimestampParsing sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Output
